page.content:
Cheltenham Gold Cup Odds 2016

The 2016 Cheltenham Gold Cup market is live throughout the season as punters look forward to the big race at the Festival in March. There are a number of horses being backed to run well at this stage and the bookmakers comparison table will be updated with all the latest market moves. Coneygree won the race in some style for Mark Bradstock last season and he will be aiming to be a back to back winner today.

The current favourite for the big race is Vautour who stormed to victory in the JLT Novices Chase last season and on that form the Willie Mullins horse is the one to beat.

Gold Cup Betting - Click To Bet
